name: Dim-sum Making Masterclass, Bangalore
description:
Calling out the dim sum lovers and food enthusiasts to a special masterclass!
Come and enjoy a fun day out with a bunch of like minded people while you make
and eat mouth watering dimsums!  
  
**Location:** Mikusu, Conrad Bengaluru  
 _25/3, Kensington Rd, Halasuru, Someshwarpura, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560008_  

**What can you expect?  
  
** \- Welcome drink and introduction to the event  
\- Brief on the history of the cuisine  
\- Hands-on dim sum making and folding experience (3 variations)  
\- Tasting followed by dessert and take home a recipe booklet

**What will you learn?**

\- Vegetable Crystal Dumpling : Steamed celery, water chestnut, lotus root and
carrot  
\- Truffle Edamame Dumpling : Edamame puree, truffle paste and potato flakes  
\- Vegetable or Chicken Potsticker : Pan fried chicken dumplings with carrot
and toban sauce

**Terms and Conditions  
****  
**\- The White Box is only the promotion and distribution partner**  
**\- This is a group experience and not a private class  
\- Each voucher is valid for 1 person only  
\- To redeem, kindly mention the order number at the venue, that you will
receive post your booking  
**\- This experience voucher is redeemable only once and cannot be rescheduled
or refunded**

name: Sushi Rolling Masterclass, Bangalore
description:
Come and enjoy a fun day out with a bunch of like minded people while you sip
on a drink, make and taste some delicious sushi!  
  
**Location:** Edo, ITC Gardenia, Bangalore  
****

**What can you expect?  
**  
\- Welcome drink on arrival  
\- Introduction to basic Japanese ingredients  
\- Hands on sushi rolling session (learn 2 variations):  
Veg: Crispy Veg Tempura Uramaki and Pickled Radish maki  
Non-veg: Prawn Tempura Uramaki and Tuna/Salmon maki  
\- Sushi tasting  
\- Service of appetisers, followed by dessert  

**To note: Separate tables are provided for vegetarian and non-vegetarian
guests**

**Terms and Conditions**  
**  
**\- The White Box is only the promotion and distribution partner**  
**\- This is a group experience and not a private class  
\- Each voucher is valid for 1 person only  
\- The voucher is redeemable only once and applicable on the to be announced
date and time of the masterclass only  
\- To redeem, kindly mention the order number at the restaurant, that you will
receive post your booking  
**- This experience voucher is redeemable for a single use only and is non-
refundable and non-reschedulable. However, if you are unable to attend, you
may transfer it to someone else who can join in your place**

name: Candle Making Workshop, Bangalore
description:
Sip on your drink and indulge in the therapeutic process of candle making!

**Venue:** Green Theory, 15, Convent Rd, Shanthala Nagar, Richmond Town,
Bengaluru, Karnataka 560025

**What can you expect?  
**  
1\. A complimentary beverage is included per person  
2\. Learn about:  
\- Basic candle making techniques  
\- Proper handling of hot wax, melting/pouring techniques for achieving smooth
and even candles  
\- Adding of fragrance and colours to achieve desired result  
3\. Hands-on candle making experience with soy wax  
\- Learn 2 variations: Tin candle and cupcake themed candle  
\- Take home the 2 candles you make!

**Terms and Conditions  
****  
**\- The White Box is only the promotion and distribution partner**  
**\- This is a group experience and not a private class  
\- Participants who are above 18 years of age only can attend  
\- Each voucher is valid for 1 person only  
\- The voucher is redeemable only once and applicable on the to be announced
date and time of the masterclass only  
\- To redeem, kindly mention the order number at the restaurant, that you will
receive post your booking  
**\- This experience voucher is redeemable for a single use only and is non-
refundable and non-reschedulable. However, if you are unable to attend, you
may transfer it to someone else who can join in your place**
